Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Marshfield
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Marshfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Marshfield.

Eastbound buses will operate via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, 119th, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, 119th, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 71st, due to a street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 71st, due to a street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
